user.title: Add Tibber Graph entry
user.description: Configure the Tibber Graph integration to display electricity prices. You can either provide a price entity or use the Tibber integration.

data.price_entity_id: Price entity (leave blank to use Tibber integration)

data_description.price_entity_id: Select a sensor entity containing price data (see [README.md](https://github.com/stefanes/tibber-graph?tab=readme-ov-file#custom-data-source) for details). Leave blank to use Tibber integration.
data_description.entity_name: Custom name for this entity. Leave blank for automatic name. Must be unique.
data_description.start_graph_at:
Starting point: 'Midnight', 'Current hour', or 'Show all' available data.
Default: Show all

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure {entity_name}
reconfigure.description: Select which values to reset to their defaults. Other settings will be preserved.

data_description.reset_hours_to_show: Reset to show all available data from start point.
data_description.reset_y_tick_count: Reset Y-axis tick count to automatic.

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single instance is allowed.
abort.tibber_not_setup: The Tibber integration must be set up first.
abort.reconfigure_successful: Selected values have been reset to their defaults.

error.entity_name_exists: An entity with this name already exists. Please choose a different name.
error.entity_not_found: The specified entity was not found.
error.not_sensor_entity: The entity must be a sensor.
error.no_price_source: Either a price entity must be provided or the Tibber integration must be configured.

set_option.name: Set option
set_option.description: Update one or more configuration options for a Tibber Graph entity.

entity_id.name: Entity ID
entity_id.description: The entity ID of the Tibber Graph camera to update.

options.name: Options
options.description: Dictionary of options to update, where keys are option names (as defined in OPTIONS.md) and values are the new values.

overwrite.name: Overwrite
overwrite.description: When true, all options not provided in the options dictionary will be reset to their default values. When false (default), only provided options are updated.

reset_option.name: Reset option
reset_option.description: Reset one or more configuration options to their default values for a Tibber Graph entity.

entity_id.name: Entity ID
entity_id.description: The entity ID of the Tibber Graph camera to reset options for.

options.name: Options
options.description: List of option names to reset (as defined in OPTIONS.md). Leave empty or omit to reset all options to their default values.

set_data_source.name: Set data source
set_data_source.description: Change the price data source for a Tibber Graph entity. Can switch between Tibber integration and a custom price entity.

entity_id.name: Entity ID
entity_id.description: The entity ID of the Tibber Graph camera to update the data source for.

price_entity_id.name: Price entity
price_entity_id.description: The entity ID of a sensor containing price data (see README.md for details). Leave empty to use the Tibber integration instead.

render.name: Render
render.description: Render the graph for a Tibber Graph entity.

entity_id.name: Entity ID
entity_id.description: The entity ID of the Tibber Graph camera to render. If not provided, all Tibber Graph entities are rendered.

set_custom_theme.name: Set custom theme
set_custom_theme.description: Set a custom theme for a Tibber Graph entity. All theme properties must be provided. Call without theme_config to clear the custom theme and revert to the configured theme.

entity_id.name: Entity ID
entity_id.description: The entity ID of the Tibber Graph camera to set the custom theme for.

theme_config.name: Theme config
theme_config.description: Dictionary containing all theme properties. If omitted or empty, clears the custom theme and reverts to the configured theme. Must include all required theme fields (please see documentation).

create_graph.name: Create graph
create_graph.description: Create a new Tibber Graph camera entity programmatically with specified configuration.

entity_name.name: Entity name
entity_name.description: The name of the new entity. Must be unique. If not provided, the name will be auto-generated from the price entity friendly name or Tibber home name.

price_entity_id.name: Price entity
price_entity_id.description: The entity ID of a sensor containing price data (see README.md for details). If not provided, the Tibber integration will be used.

options.name: Options
options.description: Dictionary of options to set for the new entity. Keys should be option names (as defined in OPTIONS.md), values should be the corresponding option values.

custom_theme.name: Custom theme
custom_theme.description: Dictionary defining a custom theme to apply to the new entity. Keys should be theme property names (as defined in CUSTOM_THEME.md), values should be the corresponding color values.

recreate.name: Recreate
recreate.description: If true, recreate the entity if it already exists. If false (default), an error will be raised if an entity with the same name already exists.

delete_graph.name: Delete graph
delete_graph.description: Delete one or more Tibber Graph camera entities programmatically.

entity_id.name: Entity ID
entity_id.description: The entity ID (or list of entity IDs) of the Tibber Graph camera to delete.

init.title: Options for {entity_name}
init.description: Configure how the price graph is displayed.

data.hours_to_show: Hours to show (leave empty for all available data)

data_description.transparent_background:
Use transparent background with selected theme.
Default: off
data_description.force_fixed_size:
Always render at fixed size.
Default: on
data_description.label_font_size:
Font size for all labels.
Default: 11
data_description.start_graph_at:
Starting point: 'Midnight', 'Current hour', or 'Show all' available data.
Default: Midnight
data_description.hours_to_show:
Number of hours to show from start point. Leave empty for all available data.
Default: all available data (reconfigure to reset)
data_description.cheap_price_points:
Number of lowest-price periods to highlight per day (0 = none). Works with 'Cheap price threshold'.
Default: 0
data_description.cheap_price_threshold:
Price threshold for highlighting cheap periods (0 = disabled). Works with 'Cheap price points'.
Default: 0
data_description.show_average_price_line:
Show dotted line at average price level.
Default: on
data_description.color_price_line_by_average:
Color price line based on average price with gradients.
Default: on
data_description.price_decimals:
Number of decimal places for prices. Leave empty for automatic.
Default: automatic (reconfigure to reset)
data_description.use_hourly_prices:
Aggregate to hourly averages.
Default: off
data_description.use_cents:
Display prices in cents.
Default: off
data_description.currency_override:
Override currency display (e.g., '€', 'SEK', 'öre'). Leave blank for automatic detection based on data source (see [OPTIONS.md](https://github.com/stefanes/tibber-graph/blob/main/docs/OPTIONS.md#currency-override) for details).
Default: automatic (reconfigure to reset)
data_description.label_show_currency:
Show currency symbol on price labels.
Default: on
data_description.label_current:
Show current price: 'On' (show in header), 'On (current price only)' (show in header, price only), 'On (in graph)' (show in graph), 'On (in graph, no price)' (show marker only), or 'Off' (hide).
Default: On
data_description.label_min:
Show min price label: 'On' (with price), 'On (no price)' (time only), or 'Off' (hide).
Default: On
data_description.label_max:
Show max price label: 'On' (with price), 'On (no price)' (time only), or 'Off' (hide).
Default: On
data_description.show_x_axis:
X-axis visibility: 'On' = show axis/labels without tick marks, 'On (with tick marks)' = show axis/labels with tick marks, 'Off' = hide completely.
Default: On
data_description.x_tick_step_hours:
Hours between each time label.
Default: 3
data_description.cheap_periods_on_x_axis:
Highlight cheap periods on X-axis: 'On' = highlight existing labels, 'On (comfy)' = show in separate row, 'On (compact)' = show on same row, 'Off' = do not highlight.
Default: Off
data_description.show_y_axis:
Y-axis visibility: 'On' = show axis/labels without tick marks, 'On (with tick marks)' = show axis/labels with tick marks, 'Off' = hide completely.
Default: On
data_description.y_tick_count:
Number of price ticks on Y-axis. Leave empty for automatic.
Default: automatic (reconfigure to reset)
data_description.y_axis_label_rotation_deg:
Rotation angle for Y-axis labels in degrees.
Default: 0
data_description.y_axis_side:
Display Y-axis on left or right side.
Default: left
data_description.y_tick_use_colors:
Color Y-axis tick labels based on price levels.
Default: off
data_description.refresh_mode:
Refresh mode: 'System' = update on camera refresh, 'System + Interval' = update on camera refresh + interval, 'Interval' = update on interval only, 'Manual' = manual updates only.
Default: System
